summary: In a backward village where members of two rival families have kept killing each other for generations, a young doctor is expected to avenge his father.
cast: Columba Domínguez|Miguel Torruco|Joaquín Cordero|Jaime Fernández|Víctor Alcocer|Silvia Derbez|José Elías Moreno|Carlos Martínez Baena|Alfredo Varela|Miguel Manzano|Manuel Dondé|Jorge Arriaga|Roberto Meyer|Chel López|José Muñoz|Humberto Almazán|Efraín Arauz|Guillermo Calles|Lupe Carriles|Enrique Carrillo|Aurora Cortés|Enedina Díaz de León|Jesús García|Emilio Garibay|Amparo Garrido|Salvador Godínez|Georgina González|Leonor Gómez|Ana María Hernández|Francisco Ledesma|Cecilia Leger|Álvaro Matute|Nemorio Mejía|Eduardo Moreno|Inés Murillo|Manuel Noriega|Diana Ochoa|Antonio Padilla 'Pícoro'|Alberto Pedret|Ignacio Peón|José Pidal|Polo Ramos|Aurora Ruiz|Salvador Terroba|Fernando Yapur
title: El río y la muerte
